pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Simulation of Normal/Exponential Random Variables and Stochastic Differential Equations / Poisson Processes // Fast simulation of some random variables than the usual native functions, including rnorm() and rexp(), using Ziggurat method, reference: MARSAGLIA, George, TSANG, Wai Wan, and al. (2000) doi:10.18637/jss.v005.i08, and fast simulation of stochastic differential equations / Poisson processes.
